name: Chewing Boy
description:
This game is made for Bored Pixel Jam 8.

2D platformer action.

Sorry my bad, it has just 1 levels.. but Enjoy!!

(If you play on phone, key x and z means X and O)
!! You can also play with gamepad !!

・left and arrow key --- move.

・z---jump .

・x --- Out chewing gum.

・If you want to restart, Enter key to open menu, and select "Reset Cart".

if you meet some trouble, please DM on twitter. @hikokyoujurou

And if you like, please support My game developing from Donation!!
